attributes.additional_details: Because many students go through unwanted pressure due to this subject, with some not being able to cope with the pressure of exams, the added weight of mathematics, makes the struggle worse. I want the government to act upon this, due to the fact, that it would help students mentally, therefore, theoretically improving their grade, in a subject they need help on.
attributes.background: Make mathematics a subject where the student is required to choose it, in order for them to do exams on it.
